content: please note feel free to contact me if you find big mistakes but i don t offer any support for this free pattern thank you **errata** german version #1 **hauptteil** **runde 2** ~~ k2tog 2 zusammenstricken **bis zum ende rechts bis 2maschen vor maschenmarkierer kfb 1 rechts** elongated tubular shawl-ish cowl or scarf with frills fold the tube in half to wear it as a cowl hasukai means diagonal in japanese -required techniques- provisional cast-on k p ssk k2tog kfb **may 2 2018** added german version translated by wooly mammoth - kaphili /people/kaphili on ravelry 1 https //www ravelry com/projects/roko/hasukai-cowl-lace
